00014 void Model::LoadModel(std::string filePath)
00015 {
00016         Assimp::Importer import;
00017         const aiScene *scene = import.ReadFile(filePath, aiProcess_FlipUVs 
00018                 | aiProcess_CalcTangentSpace
00019                 | aiProcess_Triangulate 
00020                 | aiProcess_JoinIdenticalVertices 
00021                 | aiProcess_SortByPType);
00022 
00023         m_directory = filePath.substr(0, filePath.find_last_of('/'));
00024 
00025         if (!scene || scene->mFlags & AI_SCENE_FLAGS_INCOMPLETE || !scene->mRootNode)
00026         {
00027                 std::cout << "ERROR::ASSIMP::" << import.GetErrorString() << std::endl;
00028         }
00029         else
00030                 ProcessNode(scene->mRootNode, scene);
00031 }
00032 
00033 void Model::ProcessNode(aiNode* node, const aiScene* scene)
00034 {
00035         // process all the node's meshes (if any)
00036         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node->mNumMeshes; i++)
00037         {
00038                 aiMesh *mesh = scene->mMeshes[node->mMeshes[i]];
00039                 m_meshBatch.push_back(ProcessMesh(mesh, scene));
00040         }
00041         // then do the same for each of its children
00042         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node->mNumChildren; i++)
00043         {
00044                 ProcessNode(node->mChildren[i], scene);
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 Mesh Model::ProcessMesh(aiMesh *mesh, const aiScene *scene)
00049 {
00050         std::vector<Vertex3> vertices;
00051         std::vector<unsigned int> indices;
00052         std::vector<Texture> textures;
00053 
00054         // process face data
00055         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mesh->mNumFaces; i++)
00056         {
00057                 Vertex3 vertex;
00058                 glm::vec3 vertexPos;
00059                 glm::vec4 colour;
00060                 glm::vec3 normalCoord;
00061                 glm::vec2 texCoord;
00062                 glm::vec3 tangent;
00063                 glm::vec3 biTangent;
00064 
00065                 aiFace face = mesh->mFaces[i];
00066                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00067                 {
00068                         // vertex positions
00069                         auto const &v = mesh->mVertices[face.mIndices[j]];
00070                         vertexPos.x = v.x; 
00071                         vertexPos.y = v.y; 
00072                         vertexPos.z = v.z;
00073                         vertex.m_position = vertexPos;
00074 
00075                         // colours (randomised)
00076                         colour = glm::vec4(((float)rand() / (RAND_MAX)), ((float)rand() / (RAND_MAX)), ((float)rand() / (RAND_MAX)), 1.0f);
00077                         vertex.m_colour = colour;
00078 
00079                         // normals
00080                         if (mesh->HasNormals())
00081                         {
00082                                 auto const &n = mesh->mNormals[face.mIndices[j]];
00083                                 normalCoord.x = n.x;
00084                                 normalCoord.y = n.y;
00085                                 normalCoord.z = n.z;
00086                                 vertex.m_normal = normalCoord;
00087                         }
00088                         else
00089                                 vertex.m_normal = glm::vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00090 
00091                         // texture coordinates
00092                         if (mesh->mTextureCoords[0])
00093                         {
00094                                 auto const &uv = mesh->mTextureCoords[0][face.mIndices[j]];
00095                                 texCoord.x = uv.x;
00096                                 texCoord.y = uv.y;
00097                                 vertex.m_texCoords = texCoord;
00098                         }
00099                         else
00100                                 vertex.m_texCoords = glm::vec2(0.0f, 0.0f);
00101 
00103                         //if (mesh->HasTangentsAndBitangents())
00104                         //{
00105                         //      auto const &t = mesh->mTangents[face.mIndices[j]];
00106                         //      tangent.x = t.x;
00107                         //      tangent.y = t.y;
00108                         //      tangent.z = t.z;
00109                         //      vertex.m_tangent = tangent;
00110 
00111                         //      auto const &bt = mesh->mBitangents[face.mIndices[j]];
00112                         //      biTangent.x = bt.x;
00113                         //      biTangent.y = bt.y;
00114                         //      biTangent.z = bt.z;
00115                         //      vertex.m_biTangent = biTangent;
00116                         //}
00117 
00118                         vertices.push_back(vertex);
00119                         indices.push_back(face.mIndices[j]);
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         // process materials
00123         aiMaterial* material = scene->mMaterials[mesh->mMaterialIndex];
00124         // diffuse maps
00125         std::vector<Texture> diffuseMaps = LoadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_DIFFUSE, "texture_diffuse");
00126         textures.insert(textures.end(), diffuseMaps.begin(), diffuseMaps.end());
00127         // specular maps
00128         std::vector<Texture> specularMaps = LoadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_SPECULAR, "texture_specular");
00129         textures.insert(textures.end(), specularMaps.begin(), specularMaps.end());
00130         // normal maps
00131         std::vector<Texture> normalMaps = LoadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_HEIGHT, "texture_normal");
00132         textures.insert(textures.end(), normalMaps.begin(), normalMaps.end());
00133         // height maps
00134         std::vector<Texture> heightMaps = LoadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_AMBIENT, "texture_height");
00135         textures.insert(textures.end(), heightMaps.begin(), heightMaps.end());
00136 
00137         return Mesh(vertices, indices, textures);
00138 }
00139 
00140 std::vector<Texture> Model::LoadMaterialTextures(aiMaterial* mat, aiTextureType type, std::string typeName)
00141 {
00142         std::vector<Texture> textures;
00143         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mat->GetTextureCount(type); i++)
00144         {
00145                 aiString str;
00146                 mat->GetTexture(type, i, &str);
00147                 // check if texture was loaded before and if so, continue to next iteration: skip loading a new texture
00148                 bool skip = false;
00149 
00150                 if (std::strcmp(str.C_Str(), "$texture_dummy.bmp") == 0)
00151                         skip = true;
00152 
00153                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m_texturesLoaded.size(); j++)
00154                 {
00155                         if (std::strcmp(m_texturesLoaded[j].m_path.data(), str.C_Str()) == 0)
00156                         {
00157                                 textures.push_back(m_texturesLoaded[j]);
00158                                 skip = true; // a texture with the same filepath has already been loaded, continue to next one. (optimization)
00159                                 break;
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162                 if (!skip)
00163                 {   // if texture hasn't been loaded already, load it
00164                         Texture texture;
00165                         texture.m_id = TextureFromFile(str.C_Str(), this->m_directory);
00166                         texture.m_type = typeName;
00167                         texture.m_path = str.C_Str();
00168                         textures.push_back(texture);
00169                         m_texturesLoaded.push_back(texture);  // store it as texture loaded for entire model, to ensure we won't unnecesery load duplicate textures.
00170                 }
00171         }
00172         return textures;
00173 }

00209 unsigned int TextureFromFile(const char* path, const std::string& directory)
00210 {
00211         std::string filePath = std::string(path);
00212         filePath = directory + '/' + filePath;
00213 
00214         return TextureManager::Instance().GetTextureID(filePath);
00215 }
